sentences.en: Abstract concepts and realistic situations rendered in a wild, painterly pastel sketch style.
sentences.cn: 彩色蜡笔草图风格的或抽象概念或真实描绘的野生动物主题.

sentences.en: Degas is probably my favorite pastel artist.
sentences.cn: 德加大概算是我最喜爱的彩色粉笔画家了.

sentences.en: Faded pastel charms of the naive music.
sentences.cn: 朴素音乐逐渐消褪的柔和魅力.

sentences.en: For Christie's blue - gray eyes, she goes for the brighter pastel shade.
sentences.cn: 她为克里斯蒂的灰蓝眼睛挑了较亮丽的粉色.

sentences.en: Gouache , pastel and ink on paper laid on board.
sentences.cn: 水粉画, 蜡笔和纸张上的油墨规定.

sentences.en: Pastel Boas are very clean and have a high contrast.
sentences.cn: 粉彩博厄斯是非常干净,具有较高的对比度.

sentences.en: Pastel colours are restful to the eye.
sentences.cn: 清淡柔和的颜色可以养目.

sentences.en: The lobby is decorated in pastels.
sentences.cn: 门厅用柔和的淡色彩装饰。

sentences.en: The rooms were decorated in delicate pastel shades.
sentences.cn: 房间都装修得色彩柔和.

sentences.en: The walls were painted in pastel shades.
sentences.cn: 墙壁被粉刷成了柔和的色彩。

sentences.en: They painted with gold stripes and colored with pastel blue the mask.
sentences.cn: 孩子们画上金色镶边以及使用蓝色粉蜡笔来绘制面具.

sentences.en: This design is in pastel colours with three rectangles and three triangles.
sentences.cn: 这一设计由淡色的3个长方形和3个三角形构成。

sentences.en: Wallpapers for children too often come only in sickly pastel shades.
sentences.cn: 给孩子们用的墙纸往往颜色苍白暗淡。

sentences.en: We are using the Pastel Boas to make better looking snakes.
sentences.cn: 我们使用的是粉彩博厄斯更好地寻找蛇.

sentences.en: We have a few different bloodlines of " Pastel "
sentences.cn: 我们有几个不同血统的 “ 粉彩 ”

sentences.en: We have many in pastel blue, yellow, pink and white.
sentences.cn: 我们有一些其它的轻淡柔和的颜色:蓝的 、 黄的 、 粉的还有白的.

sentences.en: We painted our living room in pastel colours to make it easy on the eye.
sentences.cn: 我们用轻淡柔和的颜色粉饰起居室,使它赏心悦目.

trans.tran_cn: 柔和的；彩色蜡笔的，粉蜡笔的
trans.tran_en: pastel colours are light and pale

trans.tran_cn: 彩色粉笔，粉蜡笔，彩色粉笔画，蜡笔画，轻淡柔和的色彩
trans.tran_en: a small coloured stick for drawing pictures with, made of a substance like  chalk
